title: In This Moment: Eternal life
description: In This Moment... Isabella and her wayward Prince unit together to form a family that has stronger bonds than any other. They come face to face with many challenges and battles. Winning some and losing some they meet many new faces along the way of gaining a bigger clan and family. With a lot of blood, lust, love, and fear this book will grab your attention from beginning to the end. The first book in a series of four.
author: Michelle Cutler
